verses.verse: When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H954>delayed<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>him,<s%> "Come, <S%H6213>make<s%> us <S%H430>gods,<s%> which shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>us;<s%> for as for this Moses, the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we <S%H3045>don't<s%> know what has become of him."

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6561>them,<s%> "Take off the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>rings,<s%> which are in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of your <S%H802>wives,<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and bring them to <S%H935>me.<s%>"
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> took <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>rings<s%> which were in their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

He <S%H3947>received<s%> what they <S%H3027>handed<s%> <S%H6696>him,<s%> and fashioned it with an engraving <S%H2747>tool,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "These are your <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

When <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1129>this,<s%> he built an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>it;<s%> and Aaron made a <S%H7121>proclamation,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

They rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H5066>brought<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> down to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6711>play.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> get <S%H3381>down;<s%> for your <S%H5971>people,<s%> who you <S%H5927>brought<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> have corrupted <S%H7843>themselves!<s%>

They have <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>them.<s%> They have made themselves a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and have <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H2076>it,<s%> and have sacrificed to <S%H559>it,<s%> and said, <S%H430><s%> 'These are your gods, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> these <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7186>behold,<s%> they are a stiff-necked <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now therefore leave me <S%H3240>alone,<s%> that my <S%H639>wrath<s%> may burn <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3615>them,<s%> and that I may consume <S%H6213>them;<s%> and I will make of you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2470>begged<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> why does your <S%H639>wrath<s%> burn <S%H2734>hot<s%> against your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you have brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand?<s%>

Why should the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'He brought them forth for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them from the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth?<s%>' <S%H7725>Turn<s%> from your <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and <S%H5162>repent<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> against your <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to whom you <S%H7650>swore<s%> by your own <S%H1696>self,<s%> and said to <S%H7235>them,<s%> 'I will multiply your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and all this <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H559>spoken<s%> of I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and they shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it <S%H5769>forever.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which he <S%H1696>said<s%> he would <S%H6213>do<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> on <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H5676>sides;<s%> on the one side and on the other they were <S%H3789>written.<s%>
The <S%H3871>tablets<s%> were the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H4385>writing<s%> was the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2801>engraved<s%> on the <S%H3871>tables.<s%>

When <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H7452>shouted,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "There is the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "It <S%H6963>isn't<s%> the voice of those who <S%H6030>shout<s%> for <S%H1369>victory,<s%> neither is it the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who <S%H6030>cry<s%> for being <S%H2476>overcome;<s%> but the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of those who <S%H6031>sing<s%> that I <S%H8085>hear.<s%>"

It <S%H7126>happened,<s%> as soon as he came near to the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> that he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> and the <S%H4246>dancing:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H639>anger<s%> grew <S%H2734>hot,<s%> and he <S%H7993>threw<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> them <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> which they had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H2912>ground<s%> it to <S%H1854>powder,<s%> and <S%H2219>scattered<s%> it <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> drink of <S%H8248>it.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "What <S%H6213>did<s%> these <S%H5971>people<s%> do to <S%H935>you,<s%> that you have brought a <S%H1419>great<s%> sin on <S%H2401>them?<s%>"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H639>"Don't<s%> let the anger of my <S%H113>lord<s%> grow <S%H2734>hot.<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they are set on <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

For they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>me,<s%> 'Make us <S%H430>gods,<s%> which shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>us;<s%> for as for this Moses, the <S%H376>man<s%> who brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we <S%H3045>don't<s%> know what has become of him.'

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2091>them,<s%> 'Whoever has any gold, let them <S%H6561>take<s%> it <S%H5414>off:<s%>' so they gave it to <S%H7993>me;<s%> and I threw it into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3318>out<s%> came this <S%H5695>calf.<s%>"

When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> had broken <S%H6544>loose,<s%> (for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had let them <S%H6544>loose<s%> for a <S%H8103>derision<s%> among their <S%H6965>enemies<s%>),

then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Whoever is on <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1121>side,<s%> come to me!" All the sons of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> gathered themselves together to <S%H622>him.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'Every man <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> on his <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H5674>go<s%> back and <S%H7725>forth<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>companion,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7138>neighbor.<s%>'"

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and there <S%H5307>fell<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Consecrate <S%H4390>yourselves<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3588>yes,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> against his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and against his <S%H251>brother;<s%> that he may <S%H5414>bestow<s%> on you a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin.<s%> Now I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> I shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sin.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>"Oh,<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin,<s%> and have <S%H6213>made<s%> themselves <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
Yet <S%H5375>now,<s%> if you will, forgive their <S%H2403>sin<s%>—and if <S%H4229>not,<s%> please blot me out of your <S%H5612>book<s%> which you have <S%H3789>written.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>"Whoever<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H4229>me,<s%> him will I blot out of my <S%H5612>book.<s%>

Now <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the place of which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4397>you.<s%> Behold, my angel shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3117>you.<s%> Nevertheless in the day when I <S%H6485>punish,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H2403>sin.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5062>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5695>calf,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>made.<s%>
